item.title: Docker Compose Nginx Tutorial
item.description: 1. What is nginx? Nginx is a reverse proxy, HTTP cache and load balancer. It aims to enhance performance by using less memory. Nginx is event-driven. That measns it uses one thread to receive requests, then it dispatch it to one or multiple threads asynchronously. In this post, you will learn how to deploy a load balancer using nginx in docker. 2. Requirements Docker Docker compose 3. How it works Supposing you have 2 servers server1 and server2 that expose a web service.
